data.title: Dirk Paessler on LinkedIn: In my conversation with Kais Baker from Turn
data.meta_description: In my conversation with Kais Baker from Turn/River Capital we talked about the story of Paessler GmbH, the company I founded in 1997 and which we were able to…
data.text:
Meet CurbTek: A Shreveport Business revolutionizing vehicle maintenance services. Shreveport native, Dalton Dean has created a better way to take care of general maintenance needs of your vehicle. However, he's not new to the entrepreneurial scene. In this week's episode of On The Cusp, Dalton chats with us about his successes and failures and why he believes that no matter how big the sting of failure is, you've got to keep swingin'. Tune in!

We couldn’t be more happy for Heather K. Margolis as she embarks on her next entrepreneurial journey. What's fantastic is that she'll continue to work hand-in-hand with 360insights as a partner! These changes are perfectly aligned with our vision to redefine the architecture of business collaboration through the upcoming launch of 360insights Ecosystems. With Heather's deep understanding of this strategy, we can't wait to work alongside her to make it a reality. Learn more: #360insights #ChannelMarketing #PartnerMarketing #360Ecosystems

Are you ready to elevate your entrepreneurial journey to new heights with The Gap and the Gain, Who Not How, and 10x Is Easier Than 2x? The Transformation Trilogy is your essential guide to success! Unleash your potential, supercharge your success, and achieve more by doing less. Together, we're paving the way to entrepreneurial excellence. 🌟 https://lnkd.in/eiyQdC-6

📌 Save this for later and share with your team! This was the mentality I had to have in the early years of my entrepreneurial journey! Tap into your upline's belief system. With a focus on results over excuses, every setback became a setup for success. #Networkmarketing #networkmarketer #networkmarketingpro #networkmarketingtips #businesstips

𝐇𝐞𝐫𝐞, 𝐚𝐭 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐁𝐮𝐬𝐢𝐧𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐋𝐞𝐚𝐝𝐞𝐫𝐬’ 𝐅𝐚𝐦𝐢𝐥𝐲, 𝐰𝐞 𝐝𝐚𝐫𝐞 𝐭𝐨 𝐥𝐨𝐨𝐤 𝐜𝐥𝐨𝐬𝐞 𝐚𝐭 𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐛𝐮𝐬𝐢𝐧𝐞𝐬𝐬𝐞𝐬. 🔵 What challenges are we facing, and what wins can we celebrate together? 🔵 How can we improve? 🔵 How can we grow? 🔵 What is working and what is not? And next week, we will look really close at our value propositions in our second BLF Gathering of 2024 - 𝐋𝐞𝐚𝐝 𝐆𝐞𝐧𝐞𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐌𝐚𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐲’ 𝐬𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐬 𝐟𝐨𝐜𝐮𝐬𝐞𝐝 𝐨𝐧 ‘𝐕𝐚𝐥𝐮𝐞 𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐩𝐨𝐬𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 / 𝐌𝐞𝐬𝐬𝐚𝐠𝐞 / 𝐃𝐢𝐟𝐟𝐞𝐫𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐢𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 + 𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐝𝐮𝐜𝐭 𝐌𝐢𝐱’. It is so important to know your Value Proposition; how to step away from the noise and focus on your core values, offering, and messaging. This will not only make it easier to market your businesses, it will also make your customers or clients feel safe in your space. When was the last time you looked at your Value Proposition? Did you establish this at the beginning of your entrepreneurial journey, or has it been shaped along the way? We are excited to hear your thoughts next week! 🔵
